name: Oberhollenzer Julitta
description: Our apartments: "TOP 1", "TOP 2" and "TOP 3" are located in the Brandberg-Strasse number 354, (only a 3 minute walk from the CHALET and our PRIVATE HOUSE) in a very central and very quiet position. The apartments are only for NON-SMOKERS! Erlebnisbad leisure pool, Scheuling Forest, Forest Festival Area Stage and Cabins: Advent-Market: Friday and Saturday evenings, mini-golf, tennis/ice skating rink, cross country ski trails, ski bus stop and the Europahaus Convention Centre are all nearby. 5 minute walk to the Penkenbahn lifts and town centre. 8 minute walk to the new Ahornbahn cable car.

Includes: heating, electricity, water, cable TV/cable receiver, INTERNET, radio alarm, safe, scales, WASTE DISPOSAL, bed linen, shower, hand and tea towels, flannels. 

Excludes final cleaning: €50,-- to €120,--

Check in: earliest 16:00 hrs  
Check out: no later than 10:00 hrs in summer, latest 09:00 hrs in winter.
B169: pass by the train station, turn left at km 29.6 (sign-posted Einfahrt Mitte), turn right at the next junction into the Hauptstraße (High Street), turn left at Gasser (butchers shop) into the Fischerstrasse, carry on until almost the end of the P.Habeler-Str. one-way street.

image.caption: Radtour für die ganze Familie © Zillertal Tourismu

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
Apartment "TOP 3": double bedroom, entrance hall with cloakroom, bathroom: bath tub, WC, basin. Store room, living room with kitchenette, large balcony. Cellar with ski boot heaters and ski rack, car parking. NON-SMOKING APARTMENT!!! Safe, radio alarm, cable TV and cable receiver, INTERNET. 
Excludes final cleaning charge: Summer: EURO 50,--, winter: EURO 60,--. 
Excludes tourist registration tax: per person from 15 years EURO 1.50 per night

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Apartment "TOP 2": 1 double bedroom, 1 double bedroom with sofa, large hallway with shoe cupboard and telephone cabinet with seating area, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, toaster, coffee machine, oven, kettle, lemon squeezer, egg cooker. Living room with dining area. Bathroom: shower, large bath, bidet, WC. 1 separate WC. Loggia, balcony, terrace, parking. Cellar with ski boot heaters. Only for NON-SMOKERS! Excludes final cleaning: €50,-- to €120,--, tourist registration tax of €1,50/P/N

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
Apartment "TOP 1": furnished in “Tyrolean” style.1 double bedroom with large wardrobe, entrance hall with cloakroom, Bathroom: bath with sink, WC, bathroom cabinet. Kitchen/lounge: kitchen with fridge, coffee machine, egg cooker, kettle, electric hob with oven, dining and cooking utensils. Dining area, lounge, traditional dresser, lounge cupboard, 2-seater couch, 2 pouffes, table. Cellar with ski boot heaters, parking; only for NON-SMOKERS!!!
Excludes final cleaning charge: €50,-- to €100,--, tourist registration tax of €1.50 P/N.

makesOffer.name: Holiday home, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
CHALET for 2 to 5 persons with garden. 1 double room with hand-basin,
1 triple bedroom with hand-basin, WC on 1st floor. Lounge with cable TV and cable receiver, fully equipped lounge/kitchen with dining and cooking utensils, dishwasher, coffee machine, toaster, kettle, egg cooker, microwave with oven, iron. Shower with WC and wash basin on ground floor. Ski boot heating and ski rack in the garage. INTERNET  
Excludes final cleaning charge: €50,-- to €110,--. Tourist registration tax of  EURO 1,50 P/N
